title: The Playgirls 3
description: This is Book 3 in The Playgirls series, The Big LeaguesThe Playgirls are in the big leagues now with serious careers and serious relationships.Katherine shocks herself with an unexpected desire for motherhood, but long-faithful Ken wants no part of it. Who will bend in order to be with the one they love?Alyssa can’t see past the end of her laptop to notice the hot hunk working five feet away in her home office. How long before their relationship erupts into passionate desire?Will Chelsea’s needs for random sexual encounters tear apart the only authentic relationship she’s ever known? Despite her best efforts, her body just won’t quit longing for one more fling!All games come to an end. But will the girls be happy with what they’ve won? There's only one way to find out...Don't miss the conclusion to the sexy Playgirls series!---Find all 3 books in the series here:Catch and Release http://www.amazon.com/dp/B00H8E5Y5MGrowing Up http://www.amazon.com/dp/B00HS8LCUYThe Big Leagues http://www.amazon.com/dp/B00HZYJP50BONUS: Get all 3 books in a boxed set and save! http://www.amazon.com/dp/B00I6TH62C
author: Clarissa Carlyle
